typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SNo as string,
		ObservationDate as date,
		{Province/State} as string,
		{Country/Region} as string,
		{Last Update} as date,
		Confirmed as float,
		Deaths as float,
		Recovered as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		SNo,
		ObservationDate,
		{Province/State},
		{Country/Region},
		{Last Update},
		Confirmed,
		Deaths,
		Recovered
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		SNo as integer,
		ObservationDate as timestamp,
		ProvinceState as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		Confirmed as decimal(18,2),
		Deaths as decimal(18,2),
		Recovered as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
